items.sentence: I don\'t think Tom is aware of his own limitations.
You\'re not planning to stay up all night, are you?
You\'re not the kind of girl I usually go out with.
Tom said he didn\'t learn anything at school today.
What\'s the worst thing that could possibly happen?
Whatever you do, don\'t complain to Tom about this.
I don\'t want to hear any more of your complaining.
Tom told me he didn\'t study French in high school.
Tom agreed that Mary\'s suggestions were good ones.
Let me think it over, and I\'ll let you know later.
Let\'s celebrate the anniversary of our first date.
It\'s a shame the way natural resources are wasted.
It\'s amazing how much money Tom spends every week.
Tom said that he couldn\'t sleep at all last night.
Playing Russian roulette isn\'t really a good idea.
Tom is just pretending he can\'t understand French.
I\'m not going to allow Tom to go to Mary\'s party.
Is there any problem with feeding my dog ice cream?
If Tom were here, I wouldn\'t have to feed the dog.
If you really want to know, why don\'t you ask Tom?
